person.name: Geoffrey
person.topic: I lead into battle!
I am good and strong!
A great warrior is a valiant warrior!Art thou valiant!Perhaps I could someday join thee!To flee battle shows cowardice!
I desire to fight again in battle!

person.name: Lord Robert
person.topic: I battle for Lord British!Are you a valiant warrior?Thou dost deserve the rune, ask Nostro!Thou art a wimp!
Outstanding!
Thou must battle long and hard to be a warrior.
Battles are few and too many!

person.name: Lady Donna
person.topic: I watch over my sheep.
Fine, all but the lump in my stomach.
It's no fun to be pregnant.Why, art thou the father?Wait till I tell my husband!Thank god!
I can't stand sheep!

person.name: Bengrod
person.topic: I search the dungeons!
Poor.
I fell in the dungeon 'Destard'.Hast thou found its altar room?It connects with Covetous, Shame and Hythloth!Find it!
Therein use the stones found in the connecting dungeons!

person.name: Sir William
person.topic: I search for valiant fighters!Art thou valiant?Strive ye to defeat all evil!I see.
Very well.
Kill not non-evil creatures but still always stand thy ground!
Let them flee instead. never flee uninjured!

person.name: Sir Hrothgar
person.topic: I fight for valor!
Excellent.
The valiant soul fears not its own visage!Art thou the most valiant of souls?This is not likely!Thou should seek the shrine of valor!
The mantra need be known, ask Aesop!

person.name: a guard
person.topic: We guard the gates and these passages!
Well.
The gates of Jhelom.
These passages are restricted.

person.name: Aesop
person.topic: I search for valor!
Well enough.
I find that 'tis easy to be brave from a safe distance!Know what I mean?Thats my problem.Thou art brave!
The mantra of valor is 'RA' use it in the shrine on the next isle!

person.name: Gravnor
person.topic: I search the dungeons.
So so.
I seek the red stone.
It is found on an altar!Dost thou have it?No wonder I can't find it!It lies in the dungeon Destard!

person.name: Senora
person.topic: I am locked up in this tower.
Well enough.
I am being punished for my crimes.
Does not matter, I can help thee!Dost thou have a ship?Then thou dost need a sextant ask the barkeep for he knows more!Too bad.

person.name: Nostro
person.topic: I built these passages and they walled me in!
Very near death!
This passage runs around the city!Wilt thou lead me out?I am saved!Thou art a cad! and I will still follow!
The rune is buried in a tower!

person.name: Luke
person.description: A ranger with a far away look.
person.topic: I seek the inner light!
Quite well.
I come from Skara Brae and am on my way to Yew.Hast thou been to Skara Brae?A fine city!'tis a spiritual city!
'tis a city based in the virtue of justice!

person.name: Max
person.topic: I am the housekeeper.
Good!
I clean the rooms.Is there some problem with thy room?I am very sorry I will correct it right away!Oh, thou had me worried!
That's a strange one at the end. People often disappear.

person.name: X
person.topic: I seek the stone
O.K.
The red stone.
Red is for valor a virtue of the avatar!Art thou an avatar?Wow!Then thou shalt need the red stone in one altar room to get the third part of a key!

person.name: Slithe
person.topic: I fight battles!
Only minor wounds!
True valor is seen not in the force of arms, but in the force of will!Art thou valiant?Then never flee unless the need is dire!Coward.
I display my valor in battle.

person.name: Timrod
person.topic: I fight with valor!
Couldn't be better!
There is no holier spot of ground than where defeated valor lies.Art thou brave?Fortune helps the brave!Coward.
Be brave for there is much to dare!
